PHRASE.LANG: Avatares de animales - Arácnidos radioactivos - Pack

Transform your avatar into an Arachnid with these locomotion objects.
 
 These locomotion objects will boost your speed.
 
 Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Animal Avatars - Radioactive Arachnids - Skitter
 (2) Animal Avatars - Radioactive Arachnids - Hunter
 (3) Animal Avatars - Radioactive Arachnids - Stalker
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
